name: settings-view
description: Edit config settings, install packages, and change themes

packageUpdateConcurrency.title: Maximum simultaneous package updates
packageUpdateConcurrency.description: Limit how many processes run simultaneously during package updates. If your machine slows down while updating many packages at once, set this value to a small positive number (e.g., `1` or `2`).

searchSettingsMinimumScore.title: Search Settings Minimum Score to Display Results
searchSettingsMinimumScore.description: Set the minimum similarity score required for a setting to appear in the search results, when searching for settings.

searchSettingsMetadata.title: Display Search Settings Metadata along with Search Results
searchSettingsMetadata.description: Whether or not to display search metadata with the search results. Metadata will appear as `{namespace}.{settingName}:{searchScore}`.

enableSettingsSearch.title: Enable Experimental Settings Search Feature
enableSettingsSearch.description: Will enable or disable the new Experimental Settings Search.

showSettingsIconInStatusBar.title: Show Settings Icon in Status Bar
showSettingsIconInStatusBar.description: Whether or not to show a settings icon in the Pulsar Status Bar.
